name: Majid
bio: I write software; occasionally, it even works.

profile_summary:
Majid is a highly skilled software developer with a strong proficiency in programming languages such as TypeScript, Go, and C. With a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions, Majid has established himself as a reliable and innovative professional in the industry. His extensive experience and expertise in software development have earned him a significant following of 27 peers, who value his insight and contributions to the field. As a seasoned developer, Majid has honed his skills in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and efficient software systems, making him a valuable asset to any project or organization.

As a prolific developer with 85 public repositories, Majid has consistently demonstrated his ability to craft software that meets the highest standards of quality and functionality. With a passion for writing software that "occasionally even works," Majid brings a unique blend of technical expertise and humor to his work. His commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies has enabled him to deliver cutting-edge solutions that drive results. Whether working on complex software development projects or collaborating with peers, Majid's technical prowess, attention to detail, and dedication to excellence make him a highly sought-after professional in the software development community.
